ygData.subject: Re: higher level songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I believe Denon s Dissension is supposed to drain the enemies mana, kind of the opposite of level 32 song.  How about level 36 song, i heard its quite a
ygData.messageBody:
Mike wrote:
>
> i have not purchased level 29 psalm of vitality or level 37 psalm of
> purity because the only info i have seen on them is that they increase
> SV for disease and poison. i never found these very useful, and also
> found it strange that two songs, both high level, would have this
> effect. does anyone have any actual experience using them?
>
> also, level 35 denon's dissension, i have bought and used, though i
> don't really know what effect it is having on the targets. i guess it
> could just be an exact upgrade of level 18 denon's disruptive discord,
> but if anyone knows it's true effects i'd love to know if it does
> anything different.
>
> Shada D'ukal, level 37 wood elf bard, Mithaniel Marr
>
> Mike
> http://u1.lvcm.com/zed22/

I believe Denon's Dissension is supposed to drain the enemies mana, kind
of the opposite of level 32 song. How about level 36 song, i heard its
quite a good one when combined with anthem de arms.

-- Eronan Songweaver - level 31 half-elf bard - Cazic-Thule
